agreement.title: Supplier Agreement

content.intro: By completing setup, you agree to the following terms:

marketplaceRole.title: Marketplace Role
marketplaceRole.description: buildApp connects you with buyers. You maintain control over pricing, inventory, and order acceptance.

successFee.title: Success Fee
successFee.description: A {{rate}}% fee applies to completed orders. No fee for rejected or cancelled orders.

deliveryStandards.title: Delivery Standards
deliveryStandards.description: Photo proof required for deliveries. Buyers have 24 hours to confirm or dispute orders.

trustMetrics.title: Trust Metrics
trustMetrics.description: Your performance is tracked (spec reliability, on-time delivery, issue rate). Better metrics improve visibility.

agreement.iAgree: I agree to the Supplier Agreement
agreement.mustAgree: You must agree to the terms to continue

billing.title: Billing & Payments
billing.subtitle: Track your success-fee charges and payment status

paymentInstructions.title: Payment Instructions
paymentInstructions.description: Invoices are generated on the 1st of each month for the previous month's completed orders. Payment is due within 15 days.

modal.title: How Success Fees Work
modal.paragraph1: Buildapp charges a success fee only on completed orders. This means you only pay when you successfully deliver materials or complete rentals.
modal.calculatedOn: Calculated on the final delivered value after any adjustments
modal.appliesTo: Applies to both material orders and equipment rentals
modal.step1: Orders are marked as "Pending" when completed
modal.step2: Invoices are generated on the 1st of each month
modal.step3: Payment is due within 15 days of invoice date
modal.step4: Fees are marked as "Paid" once payment is received
modal.questions: If you have questions about any charges or need to dispute a fee, please contact our support team.
